member.name: M:SharpAIKit.Output.JsonOutputParser`1.MyRegex
member.remarks:
Pattern:
```(?:json)?\\s*([\\s\\S]*?)```
Options:
RegexOptions.IgnoreCase
Explanation:
Match the string "```".
Optional (greedy).
Match a character in the set [Jj].
Match a character in the set [Ss].
Match a character in the set [Oo].
Match a character in the set [Nn].
Match a whitespace character greedily any number of times.
1st capture group.
Match any character lazily any number of times.
Match the string "```".

member.name: T:SharpAIKit.Output.CommaSeparatedListParser
member.summary: Parses comma-separated values into a list.

member.name: T:SharpAIKit.Output.NumberedListParser
member.summary: Parses numbered list output.

member.name: M:SharpAIKit.Output.NumberedListParser.MyRegex1
member.remarks:
Pattern:
^\\d+[.)] (.+)$
Options:
RegexOptions.Multiline
Explanation:
Match if at the beginning of a line.
Match a Unicode digit atomically at least once.
Match a character in the set [).].
Match ' '.
1st capture group.
Match a character other than '\n' greedily at least once.
Match if at the end of a line.

member.name: T:SharpAIKit.Output.BooleanParser
member.summary: Parses boolean yes/no responses.

member.name: M:SharpAIKit.Output.BooleanParser.MyRegex2
member.remarks:
Pattern:
^(yes|true|correct|affirmative|1)\\.?$
Explanation:
Match if at the beginning of the string.
1st capture group.
Match with 5 alternative expressions.
Match the string "yes".
Match the string "true".
Match the string "correct".
Match the string "affirmative".
Match '1'.
Match '.' atomically, optionally.
Match if at the end of the string or if before an ending newline.

member.name: M:SharpAIKit.Output.BooleanParser.MyRegex3
member.remarks:
Pattern:
^(no|false|incorrect|negative|0)\\.?$
Explanation:
Match if at the beginning of the string.
1st capture group.
Match with 5 alternative expressions.
Match the string "no".
Match the string "false".
Match the string "incorrect".
Match the string "negative".
Match '0'.
Match '.' atomically, optionally.
Match if at the end of the string or if before an ending newline.

member.name: M:SharpAIKit.Output.KeyValueParser.MyRegex4
member.remarks:
Pattern:
^(.+?):\\s*(.+)$
Options:
RegexOptions.Multiline
Explanation:
Match if at the beginning of a line.
1st capture group.
Match a character other than '\n' lazily at least once.
Match ':'.
Match a whitespace character greedily any number of times.
2nd capture group.
Match a character other than '\n' greedily at least once.
Match if at the end of a line.
